TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sansaru, title = Sansaru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sansaru} }

S.FORM: Sansaru Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Sansaru a niyaro', 45 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 128 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 116 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal85%, Saysiyat3%, Amis2%, Paiwan1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Sansaro Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Sansaro a niyaro', 45 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 128 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 91% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 116 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 9% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal85%, Saysiyat3%, Amis2%, Paiwan1%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
